name: growl
effect: Lowers the target’s Attack by one stage.
short_effect: Lowers the target’s Attack by one stage.

flavor_text.black_white: The user growls in an endearing way, making the opposing team less wary. The foes’ Attack stats are lowered.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user growls in an endearing way, making the opposing team less wary. The foes’ Attack stats are lowered.
